title: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields. Integration build 09/17. The text fields used in the Info page of the Project Properties dialog look bad on all motif platforms.
EB: In the Info page of the Project Properties dialog, the text fields are created as readonly Text fields instead of Labels. It is assumed that their values can be selected and copied by the user.
